event.title: Design-A-Room Workshop
event.body: !format (( In this workshop we will brainstorm room layouts given a theme, and will design a small representation of a building/room/layout of their choice that fits within the chosen theme. )) (( This workshop is designed to help participants practice and/or explore artistic environmental design, while sticking with a solid and cohesive idea. Additionally, participants will work on interior design, lighting, and atmosphere to create a simple concept of a room and how these aspects relate to game design. )) (( During the workshop we will focus on various artistic techniques and aspects that add to the development of cohesive, in-depth environments. ))
